title: Bat-Manga! - The Secret History of Batman in Japan
description:
Bat-Manga!: The Secret History of Batman in Japan is a 2008 book published by Pantheon Books. The book was designed by Chip Kidd with the assistance of photographer Geoff Spear. In 1966, Batman manga was created during the Batman craze in Japan, when the hit US TV series came to Japanese television audiences.
